bike.description: S-Works SL4 FACT 11r, FACT construction, Women's Performance Geometry and layup, tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" headtube, carbon OSBB

components.description: S-Works Amira, FACT carbon full monocoque, 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" tapered steerer
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower hybrid cartridge lightweight bearings, 8mm carbon cone spacer, w/ 20mm of carbon spacers
OS integrated, CeramicSpeed, sealed ceramic bearings
